## Conditions.Condition.matchesContext() method

Determines if this condition matches the supplied [validated context](./ts-res.context.ivalidatedcontextdecl.md)<!-- -->.

**Signature:**

```typescript
matchesContext(context: Context.IValidatedContextDecl, options?: Context.IContextMatchOptions): boolean;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

context


</td><td>

[Context.IValidatedContextDecl](./ts-res.context.ivalidatedcontextdecl.md)


</td><td>

The [context](./ts-res.context.ivalidatedcontextdecl.md) to match against.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[Context.IContextMatchOptions](./ts-res.context.icontextmatchoptions.md)


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The [options](./ts-res.context.icontextmatchoptions.md) to use when matching the context.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

boolean

`true` if the condition matches the context, `false` otherwise.

## Remarks

A condition matches a context if it is present and the comparison yields a non-zero [match score](./ts-res.qualifiermatchscore.md)<!-- -->, \*or\* if the condition is not present in the context.
